name: Hacktopus
description:
Your mom is sick and dying, because she can't afford the medicine and doesn't have insurance. So as her good son, you make yourself on the way to hack the Research Facility with the medicine.

He is an Octopus. His name is Hecktor. He is... THE HACKTOPUS.

This game was made at the InnoGames Game Jam #7 in 2014, by a team of 4 people within 48 hours.
